Regulation Name(s): Calculator/data processing module for clinical use
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): Glucose Shepherd Blood Glucose Monitoring System
ADVOCATE Redi-Code BMB-EA001S Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for BroadMaster HealthCare System software for managing and analyzing blood glucose data from compatible BroadMaster Biotech glucose meters
Indications for Use Summary: Software accessory for BroadMaster Biotech glucose meters aiding home diabetes management by collecting, storing, analyzing, and reporting glucose data for multiple users via personal computer
